title: Tzute
description: very used, old style; tan; two panels stitched together; appears to have a date embroidered at corner of one selvedge side; two embroideries \"framed\" at center, geometric and bird like; tight weave; another embroidered emblem at corner opposite dated selvedge
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
